value.title: Make your Power BI mobile reports POP
value.excerpt: You wanted better control over your Power BI Mobile Report layouts? Look no further. Michal Heldy joins us to walk us through how to get the most out of this new enhancement in Power BI Desktop! value.title: How to Set Up Power BI Gateway to Connect to On-Premise Data in Enterprise Mode
